content: i hope you love this fun pattern it s free to view on the blog through the link here on ravelry or you may choose to purchase the ad-free printable pattern from my etsy shop here 1 inspired by the peace and rugged beauty of the rockies this cozy striped throw will add texture warmth and color to any space the perfect weight and drape lay it over your favorite chair or gift it as an heirloom to a loved one using up to eight colors of your choice you ll knit this up without getting bored as the various stitch patterns and colors emerge easy enough for knitters that are comfortable with knitting and purling make it in any color combo even one solid color enjoy materials 8 skeins of lion brand yarn hue + me in 8 various colors chunky #5 yarn 137 yds/skein 125 g/skein pattern uses approximately 1 000 grams total colors used and pictured are salt desert bellini love song spicy crush marine harbor us size 15 10 mm 36 or longer circular knitting needles blanket is knit flat scissors stitch markers optional tapestry needle to weave in ends size approximate one size throw/lapghan 52 x 48 see tips on adjusting the size in the pattern notes section 1 https //www etsy com/listing/1350039708/sampler-striped-blanket-knitting-pattern
